Introduction.content:
In the small village of Mcheche, everyone knew one man: Bwana Haraka. He was always running but somehow still late for everything...

One day he bought the newest phone in Dar es Salaam – and it had a very strange appetite.

Chapter 1.chapter_title: The Day the Phone Discovered Chapati
Chapter 1.content:
While running to the daladala, the phone slipped and… CHOMP!

![Phone eating chapati](https://i.ibb.co/4p7Z7vZ/phone-eating-chapati.jpg)

The phone swallowed the entire chapati in 3 seconds!

Chapter 2.content: The next day he tied the chapati with seven knots. The phone still ate the plastic too!

Chapter 3.chapter_title: The Phone Joins WhatsApp Food Group
Chapter 3.content: It joined every food group in Tanzania. When the boss wrote 'Come NOW', it thought he said 'naan' and ate the message.

Chapter 4.content: They passed a law: No chapati within 2 metres of Bwana Haraka’s phone!

Chapter 5.content:
He left 50 chapatis for the phone overnight.

![Empty plate](https://i.ibb.co/8XgqKxL/empty-plate-crumbs.jpg)

Morning: only a thank-you note remained!

Conclusion.content: Now Bwana Haraka walks slowly and eats first. And somewhere there’s a very fat, very happy phone that never needs charging again.
